import React,{useState} from 'react' import './buying.css' import {Form, FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button} from "reactstrap" const Buying = ({livingroom,avgRating}) => { const{price,reviews}=livingroom const [credentials,setCredentials]=useState({ userId:'01', userEmail:'ranaweerasc3714@gmail.com', firstName:'', lastName:'', phone:'', no:1, }) const handleChange=e=>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const handleClick = e=>{ e.preventdefault() console.log(credentials) } return

${price}/one item

{avgRating===0?null:avgRating}({reviews?.length})
Information
${price} 1 item
${price}
Delivery Charge
$100
Total
${price+100}
} export default Buying
